files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Contains functions to search for words and phrases, count their occurrences, perform verse range searches, and calculate gematrical values based on Abjad numeral mapping of Arabic letters.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a word in the Quran verses by iterating through the provided Quran data and returns verses that contain the search word, with an option for case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group (exact phrase) in the Quran verses, supporting both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word group (exact phrase) within a specified Surah in the Quran data, with an option for case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

parameters.name: quran_data

parameters.name: word_group

parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.description: The ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.description: Searches for a word group within a specified verse range in the Quran data, with an option for case-sensitive comparison.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: The ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Returns Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words that a verse must contain.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Searches for Quran verses where the word count is a multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple that the verse word count must conform to; must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic word or phrase by summing the numerical values of its letters.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase for which the gematrical value is calculated.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for words in the Quran that have a specified gematrical value and returns their occurrences with location details.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match for words.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for word groups in the Quran that have a specific gematrical value, returning verses where the group is found if its computed value matches the target.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value that the word group must match.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the search is case-sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value of all words within a specified Surah by summing the gematrical values of each word.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which to calculate the total gematrical value.
